Mayhem.origin: [Anglo-French mahaim mahain , literally, mutilation, from Old French mahain , from mahaignier to injure, mutilate]

1.1: willful and permanent crippling, mutilation, or disfigurement of any part of another's body

2.1: the crime of engaging in mayhem
2.note: Under the Model Penal Code and the codes of the states that follow it, mayhem is encompassed by assault and aggravated assault.
